Episodes.Title: Unfarming
Episodes.Actors: Jeremy Clarkson, Kaleb Cooper, Gerald Cooper
Episodes.Plot: Back at Diddly Squat farm, scorching weather destroys crops. With supply costs inflated, dreams for a restaurant fade as the farm shop faces closure. Clarkson scrambles for new income sources while someone new at Diddly Squat irks...

Episodes.Title: Porking
Episodes.Actors: Jeremy Clarkson, Andrew Cato, Kaleb Cooper
Episodes.Plot: Jeremy sets to work getting the farm ready for it's newest residents, some Shandy and Black pigs. Meanwhile Kaleb is annoyed when he spots someone else drilling in his fields.

Episodes.Title: Jobbing
Episodes.Actors: Rupert Arneil, Jeremy Clarkson, Kaleb Cooper
Episodes.Plot: It's Christmas time on the farm and Kaleb gives Jeremy a festive surprise. However their relationship becomes strained as they bicker while getting on with the farms winter jobs.

Episodes.Title: Harrowing
Episodes.Actors: Jeremy Clarkson, Kaleb Cooper, Annie Gray
Episodes.Plot: Jeremy treats Kaleb to something he hopes will help with his farming, and Lisa and Jeremy discover just how tough being pig farmers can be.

Episodes.Title: Healing
Episodes.Actors: Jeremy Clarkson, Lucca Allen, Andrew Cato
Episodes.Plot: Spring has sprung and rejuvenated Jeremy's farming the unfarmed idea, as he takes on multiple new projects to try and turn a profit from his unused land.. And there are some one week old arrivals to the farm to lift everyone's spi...

Episodes.Title: Mushrooming
Episodes.Actors: Jeremy Clarkson, Gerald Cooper, Kaleb Cooper
Episodes.Plot: Jeremy's cheap mushroom growing plan comes to fruition, whilst the mounting cost of essential farming goods begins to become a major concern for the farm.

Episodes.Title: Parking
Episodes.Actors: Jeremy Clarkson, Kaleb Cooper, Gerald Cooper
Episodes.Plot: Team Diddly assemble for a much needed building project and Jeremy brings in the Chairman of the British Deer Society to help with the deer management issues on the farm.

Episodes.Title: Calculating
Episodes.Actors: Alan Townsend, Andrew Cato, Gerald Cooper
Episodes.Plot: Harvest time arrives and is tenser than ever, as Jeremy and Kaleb find out how profitable both Jeremy's new projects and Kaleb's arable farming have been this year.
